channel.title: 508 please help(i got teamviewer)!
channel.description:
Ok i set up my server and i know how to get it online but when i run my servers source or a 508 client it always says 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command operable program or batch file. I have windows seven and i know were to go to set the environmental variables, i just need help with what do i need to put in for the path so itll work. also i have an acer computer
For other specific information if you want to know
Computer Information:
.AMD Athlon ™ 64 X2 processor L310(1.20 GHz) .ATI Radeon ™ HD3200 Graphics up to 1919MB Hypermemory ™ .15.6" 16:9 LCD .4 GB Memory .250 GB HDD .DVD-Super Multi DL drive .Acer Nplify ™ 802.11b/g/Draft-N .6-cell Li-ion battery
Just additional information in case you need it, But please help me set this up please be helpful. :'( PLEASE HELP ME! :( :( :( :( :( :( :'(

item.title: 508 please help(i got teamviewer)!
item.dc:creator: @moparscape5399 moparscape5399
item.description:
@moparscape5399 wrote:

THIS WILL DEFINITELY ANSWER MY QUESTIONS AND HELP ME ANSWER MY PROBLEM SO PLEASE HELP ME. OK SO I HAVE JDK1.6.0_17 32BIT AND FOR SOME REASON I DONT SEE IT WHEN I GO TO PROGRAM FILES (X86) AND THEN GO TO JAVA ALL I SEE IS JRE6 AND I THINK THIS IS HAPPENING BECAUSE I DONT HAVE JDK1.6.0_17 64 BIT IF YOU CAN FIND ME A LINK TO THE LATEST JAVA AS A 64 BIT THAT WOULD BE A BIG HELP SO PLEASE HELP ME IM BEGGING YOU.

I HAVE BEEN AT THIS FOR 3 WEEKS!!! AND IT IS SOOO FUSTRATING!!! :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:
